title: Understanding Best Fit
text: Best fit adjusts the column or row width to accommodate the longest or tallest entry so that all content is visible without cutting off any text.

title: How to Apply Best Fit
text: To apply best fit, you can double-click the boundary on the right side of the column header or the bottom of the row header.

hintAnswer: widest entry fits into the column, so it can be seen fully
